verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Give <S%H3051><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O you mighty, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H410><s%> give <S%H3051><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> and strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Give <S%H3051><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> due to his name; <S%H8034><s%> worship <S%H7812><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the beauty <S%H1927><s%> of holiness. <S%H6944><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on the waters: <S%H4325><s%> the God <S%H410><s%> of glory <S%H3519><s%> thunders: <S%H7481><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is on many <S%H7227><s%> waters. <S%H4325><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is powerful; <S%H3581><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is full of majesty. <S%H1926><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> breaks <S%H7665><s%> the cedars; <S%H730><s%> yes, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> breaks <S%H7665><s%> the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>
He makes them also to skip <S%H7540><s%> like a calf; <S%H5695><s%> Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> and Sirion <S%H8303><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> a young <S%H1121><s%> unicorn. <S%H7214><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> divides <S%H2672><s%> the flames <S%H3852><s%> of fire. <S%H784><s%>
The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shakes <S%H2342><s%> the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shakes <S%H2342><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> makes the hinds <S%H355><s%> to calve, <S%H2342><s%> and discovers <S%H2834><s%> the forests: <S%H3295><s%> and in his temple <S%H1964><s%> does every <S%H3605><s%> one speak <S%H559><s%> of his glory. <S%H3519><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> on the flood; <S%H3999><s%> yes, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> to his people; <S%H5971><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will bless <S%H1288><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with peace. <S%H7965><s%>
